remarks: Absolute value of differences around common element.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-May-2016.)
statement:
abscld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
abssubd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
abs3difd.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
abs3difd $p |- ( ph -> ( abs ` ( A - B ) ) <_ ( ( abs ` ( A - C ) ) + ( abs ` ( C - B ) ) ) ) $.
